3: Lee fished out a small, square-shaped pendant from his collar.
This is a souvenir Murray gave me.
Murray... That's your little brother in Babylonia, right?
Do you not have family in Babylonia?
Alright, it's not the time for this anyway.
This toy is a mini graviton detector. Just something you can buy in the souvenir shops near the living quarters.
'Find me from anywhere', that was its motto. Of course, just commercial talk.
This toy has a small detection area, is highly inaccurate, and becomes disrupted easily.
But for us, if we simply move along with it and record its reactive signals, we can theoretically deduce a vague but usable map.
And from the map, not only can we find the direction, but also the location of the projectors.
Then... I'll leave it to you, Lee.
